trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> i banen for den angitte verdien.

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer resultatet av en tilbakeringing hendelse som er rettet mot en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to retrieve data and the GetCallbackResult method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollere implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>grensesnittet og bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>til å hente data og GetCallbackResult-metoden til å returnere de hentede dataene til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: Resultatene av tilbakeringing.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til en node når musepekeren er plassert over den.

trans-unit.source: Use the HoverNodeStyle property to control the appearance of a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen HoverNodeStyle for å kontrollere utseendet til en node når musepekeren er plassert over den.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objektet som returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `HoverNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objektet (for eksempel `HoverNodeStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HoverNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `HoverNodeStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: This feature is supported only on script-capable clients.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonen støttes bare på script-kompatibel klienter.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To use the HoverNodeStyle property, you must include a `<head>` element with a `runat="server"` attribute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å bruke egenskapen HoverNodeStyle, du må inkludere en `<head>` element med en `runat="server"` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge, skriftegenskaper og noden avstand.

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Stilegenskaper brukes i denne rekkefølgen: 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, avhengig av nodetypen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>samling er angitt, brukes nå, overstyrer de andre noden stilegenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: HoverNodeStyle.
trans-unit.target: HoverNodeStyle.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The style settings for the HoverNodeStyle property override any corresponding node style settings that are in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Stilinnstillingene for egenskapen HoverNodeStyle overstyre tilsvarende noden stilinnstillinger i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HoverNodeStyle property is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HoverNodeStyle gjengis ikke for en node med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>-egenskapen satt til `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> properties, which are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> objects, the HoverNodeStyle property is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>Egenskaper, som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objekter HoverNodeStyle-egenskapen er en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> that represents the style of a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen på en node når musepekeren er plassert over den.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of images to use for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gruppen av bilder som skal brukes det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the ImageSet property to specify the group of images to use for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ImageSet-egenskapen til å angi gruppen av bilder som skal brukes det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can either select a predefined set of images to give the control a standard look or define your own custom set.
trans-unit.target: Du kan velge en forhåndsdefinert sett med bilder for å gi kontrollen et standard utseende eller definere dine egne egendefinerte sett.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ImageSet property does not affect any style settings for a node.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For ImageSet egenskapen påvirker ikke alle innstillingene for en node.

trans-unit.source: Set the appropriate style property, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A> property, if you want to add custom colors and spacing.
trans-unit.target: Angi stilegenskapen riktig som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>egenskapen Hvis du vil legge til egendefinerte farger og avstand.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid values for The ImageSet property.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser gyldige verdier for egenskapen ImageSet-egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: |Image set|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`TreeViewImageSet.Arrows`|A predefined image set that uses arrow images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList`|A predefined image set that uses diamond-shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList2`|A predefined image set that uses square-shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList3`|A predefined set of sectioned, diamond shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList4`|A predefined set of alternate sectioned, diamond shaped bullet images in sizes that vary by level.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Contacts`|A predefined image set that uses MSN Messenger images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`|A user-defined image set.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Events`|A predefined image set that uses event log-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Faq`|A predefined image set that uses FAQ-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Inbox`|A predefined image set that uses e-mail-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.News`|A predefined image set that uses newsgroup-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Simple`|A predefined image set that uses simple shape outlines.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Simple2`|A predefined image set that uses simple filled shapes.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Msdn`|A predefined image set that uses MSDN images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.WindowsHelp`|A predefined image set that uses Microsoft Windows Help images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.XPFileExplorer`|A predefined image set that uses Windows Explorer images available in Microsoft Windows XP.| When defining a custom set of images, you should specify an image for each of the properties in the following table.
trans-unit.target: | Bilde Sett | Beskrivelse | |---------------|-----------------| | `TreeViewImageSet.Arrows`| En forhåndsdefinert bilde Sett som bruker pil bilder. | | `TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList`| En forhåndsdefinert bilde Sett som bruker rombeformede punkt bilder. | | `TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList2`| En forhåndsdefinert bilde Sett som bruker firkant-formet punkt bilder. | | `TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList3`| En forhåndsdefinert sett med inndelte, rombeformede formet punkt bilder. | | `TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList4`| En forhåndsdefinert sett med alternativ inndelte rombeformede formet punkt bilder i størrelser varierer etter nivå. | | `TreeViewImageSet.Contacts`| En forhåndsdefinert bilde Sett som bruker MSN Messenger bilder. | | `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`| Et sett med brukerdefinerte bilde. | | `TreeViewImageSet.Events`| En forhåndsdefinert bilde Sett som bruker hendelsesloggen stilen bilder. | | `TreeViewImageSet.Faq`| En forhåndsdefinert bilde Sett som bruker vanlige spørsmål om stilen bilder. | | `TreeViewImageSet.Inbox`| En forhåndsdefinert bilde Sett som bruker e-post-stilen bilder. | | `TreeViewImageSet.News`| En forhåndsdefinert bilde Sett som bruker nyhetsgruppe stilen bilder. | | `TreeViewImageSet.Simple`| En forhåndsdefinert bilde Sett som bruker enkel figur kantlinjer. | | `TreeViewImageSet.Simple2`| En forhåndsdefinert bilde Sett som bruker enkel fylt former. | | `TreeViewImageSet.Msdn`| En forhåndsdefinert bilde Sett som bruker MSDN-bilder. | | `TreeViewImageSet.WindowsHelp`| En forhåndsdefinert bilde Sett som bruker Hjelp for Windows bilder. | | `TreeViewImageSet.XPFileExplorer`| En forhåndsdefinert bilde Sett som bruker Windows Utforsker bildene som finnes i Microsoft Windows XP. | Når du definerer et egendefinert sett med bilder, må du angi et bilde for hver av egenskapene i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the default image for that property is used.
trans-unit.target: Ellers brukes standardbildet for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>|The URL to a custom image for the collapsible node indicator.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>|The URL to a custom image for the expandable node indicator.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>|The URL to a folder that contains custom images for the lines that connect nodes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>|The URL to a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.| The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>| URL-adressen til et egendefinert bilde for indikatoren skjulbare noden. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>| URL-adressen til et egendefinert bilde for indikatoren utvides noden. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>| URL-adressen til en mappe som inneholder egendefinerte bilder for linjer som kobler til noder. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>| URL-adressen til et egendefinert bilde for indikatoren ikke kan utvides noden. | Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeViewImageSet"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeViewImageSet"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_TreeViewImageSet.Custom" name="TreeViewImageSet.Custom" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_TreeViewImageSet.Custom" name="TreeViewImageSet.Custom" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified image set is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeViewImageSet"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte bildet er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeViewImageSet"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til bladnoder.

trans-unit.source: Use the LeafNodeStyle property to control the appearance of the leaf nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk LeafNodeStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til blad-nodene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `LeafNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objektet (for eksempel `LeafNodeStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `LeafNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `LeafNodeStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge, skriftegenskaper og noden avstand.

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1.
trans-unit.target: Stilegenskaper brukes i denne rekkefølgen for prioritet: 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or LeafNodeStyle, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, eller LeafNodeStyle, avhengig av nodetypen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>samling er angitt, brukes nå, overstyrer de andre noden stilegenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil generere tabellen med innholdet – stilen navigasjonsmenyer der noder på et bestemt nivå må ha samme utseendet, uavhengig om de har underordnede noder, kan du vurdere å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>egenskapen i stedet for å angi egenskapene individuelle-stil.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the leaf nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for blad-nodene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> objects that represent the node styles at the individual levels of the tree.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objekter som representerer node-stiler på individuelle nivåer i treet.

trans-unit.source: Use the LevelStyles collection as an alternative to the individual style properties (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A> property) to control the style of nodes at the individual levels of the tree.
trans-unit.target: Bruk samlingen LevelStyles som et alternativ til individuelle stilegenskaper (slik som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>egenskapen) til å kontrollere stilen for noder på individuelle nivåene i treet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of nodes in the first level of the tree.
trans-unit.target: Den første malen i samlingen tilsvarer stilen for noder i det første nivået i treet.

trans-unit.source: The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of nodes in the second level of the tree, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Andre stilen i samlingen tilsvarer stilen for noder i det andre nivået på tre og så videre.

trans-unit.source: This property is most often used to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis til å generere tabellen med innholdet – stilen navigasjonsmenyer der noder på et bestemt nivå må ha samme utseendet, uavhengig om de har underordnede noder.

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Stilegenskaper brukes i denne rekkefølgen: 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, avhengig av nodetypen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the LevelStyles collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis LevelStyles-samlingen er angitt, brukes nå, overstyrer andre noden stilegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"></xref> that represents the node styles at the individual levels of the tree.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"> </xref> som representerer node-stiler på individuelle nivåer i treet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to a folder that contains the line images that are used to connect child nodes to parent nodes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir banen til mappen som inneholder linje bildene som brukes til å koble underordnede noder på overordnede noder.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control can display lines that connect child nodes to parent nodes when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen kan vise linjene som kobler underordnede noder til overordnede noder når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When lines are displayed, use the LineImagesFolder property to specify a Web-accessible folder that contains the set of pre-rendered images to use for the lines.
trans-unit.target: Når linjer vises, kan du bruke egenskapen LineImagesFolder til å angi en tilgjengelig mappe som inneholder settet med over gjengitte bilder skal brukes for linjene.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the images that are used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver bilder som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: |Image|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |Dash.gif|A line image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure and the root node is a leaf.| |Dashminus.gif|A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure to indicate that the root node is expanded.| |Dashplus.gif|A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure to indicate that the root node is collapsed.| |I.gif|A line image displayed to connect adjacent nodes.| |L.gif|A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch when the node is a leaf.| |Lminus.gif|A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch to indicate that the node is expanded.| |Lplus.gif|A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch to indicate that the node is collapsed.| |Minus.gif|A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: | Bildet | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | Dash.gif| Et bilde vises ved siden av rotnoden når det finnes bare én rotnode i treet og rotnoden en bladnode. | | Dashminus.gif| Et minustegn (-) bilde vises ved siden av rotnoden når det finnes bare én rotnode i treet-strukturen som angir at rotnoden er utvidet. | | Dashplus.gif| En plusstegnet (+)-bildet som vises ved siden av rotnoden når det finnes bare én rotnode i treet strukturen til å angi at rotnoden er skjult. | | I.gif| Et bilde vises for å koble til tilstøtende noder. | | L.gif| Et bilde vises neste til siste node i en gren når noden er en bladnode. | | Lminus.gif| Et bilde vises neste til siste node i en gren som angir at noden er utvidet. | | Lplus.gif| Et bilde vises neste til siste node i en gren til å angi at noden er skjult. | | Minus.gif| Et minustegn (-) bildet vises ved siden av den første rotnoden i en trestruktur som inneholder flere rotnoder for å angi at noden vises.

trans-unit.source: This image does not contain an extra line and is displayed only after the root node has been collapsed once.
trans-unit.target: Dette bildet inneholder ikke en ekstra linje og vises bare når rotnoden er skjult én gang.

trans-unit.source: When the page is first loaded, the Rminus.gif image is displayed.| |Noexpand.gif|A blank spacer image displayed next to a leaf node.
trans-unit.target: Når siden lastes først, Rminus.gif bildet vises. | | Noexpand.gif| En tom for avstand bildet vises ved siden av en bladnode.

trans-unit.source: This image allows text to line up vertically.| |Plus.gif|A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Dette bildet kan teksten linje opp loddrett. | | Plus.gif| Et bilde for plusstegnet (+) vises ved siden av den første rotnoden i en trestruktur som inneholder flere rotnoder å angi at noden er skjult.

trans-unit.source: This image does not contain an extra line and is displayed only after the root node has been expanded once.
trans-unit.target: Dette bildet inneholder ikke en ekstra linje og vises bare når rotnoden er utvidet én gang.

trans-unit.source: When the page is first loaded, the Rplus.gif image is displayed.| |R.gif|A line image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is a leaf node.| |Rminus.gif|A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: Når siden lastes først, Rplus.gif bildet vises. | | R.gif| Et bilde vises ved siden av den første rotnoden i en trestruktur som inneholder flere rotnoder for å angi at noden er en bladnode. | | Rminus.gif| Et minustegn (-) bildet vises ved siden av den første rotnoden i en trestruktur som inneholder flere rotnoder for å angi at noden vises.

trans-unit.source: This image contains an extra line and is displayed only when the page is first loaded.
trans-unit.target: Dette bildet inneholder en ekstra linje og vises bare når siden lastes først.

trans-unit.source: After the root node has been collapsed once, The Minus.gif image is displayed.| |Rplus.gif|A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Når rotnoden er skjult når, vises det Minus.gif bildet. | | Rplus.gif| Et bilde for plusstegnet (+) vises ved siden av den første rotnoden i en trestruktur som inneholder flere rotnoder å angi at noden er skjult.

trans-unit.source: This image contains an extra line and is displayed only when the page is first loaded.
trans-unit.target: Dette bildet inneholder en ekstra linje og vises bare når siden lastes først.

trans-unit.source: After the root node has been expanded once, the Plus.gif image is displayed.| |T.gif|A line image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is a leaf.| |Tminus.gif|A minus sign (-) image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is expanded.| |Tplus.gif|A plus sign (+) image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > If the LineImagesFolder property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control will use the built-in, default images (20 x 20 pixels).
trans-unit.target: Når rotnoden er utvidet én gang, vises Plus.gif bildet. | | T.gif| Et bilde vises ved siden av en node midt i treet-struktur (for en t-skjæringspunktet) for å angi at noden er en bladnode. | | Tminus.gif| Et minustegn (-) bilde vises ved siden av en node midt i treet-struktur (for en t-skjæringspunktet) for å angi at noden vises. | | Tplus.gif| Et bilde for plusstegnet (+) vises ved siden av en node midt i treet-struktur (for en t-skjæringspunktet) for å angi at noden er skjult. | > [!NOTE] > Hvis egenskapen LineImagesFolder ikke er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen bruker de innebygde standardbildene (20 x 20 piksler).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Some visual designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, provide tools to generate the line images.
trans-unit.target: Noen visuelle verktøy, for eksempel Microsoft Visual Studio, angi verktøy for å generere linjebilder.

trans-unit.source: The run time does not flip custom images for right-to-left displays.
trans-unit.target: Kjøretiden Bla ikke egendefinerte bilder for høyre-mot-venstre viser.

trans-unit.source: To support both left-to-right and right-to-left Web pages, you must create image sets for both directions.
trans-unit.target: For å støtte både venstre mot høyre og høyre-mot-venstre nettsider, må du opprette bildet angir begge retninger.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The path to a folder that contains the line images used to connect nodes.
trans-unit.target: Banen til mappen som inneholder linje bildene brukes til å koble noder.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the LineImagesFolder property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at LineImagesFolder-egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Processes postback data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Prosesser tilbake dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET page framework tracks all the server controls that return `true` from the LoadPostData method call, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method on those controls.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET siden framework sporer alle serverkontroller returnere `true` fra metodekallet LoadPostData og starter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>-metoden på kontrollene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen identifikatoren for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen av alle navneverdier som innkommende.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control's state changes as a result of the postback event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollens tilstandsendringer som et resultat av hendelsen sende tilbake; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tidligere lagret visningsstatusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A object that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder lagrede visningen verdiene for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of tree levels to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det maksimale antallet tre nivåer som skal bindes til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When binding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to a data source, use the MaxDataBindDepth property to limit the number of tree levels to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Ved binding av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollere til en datakilde, bruke egenskapen MaxDataBindDepth til å begrense antall tre nivåer som skal bindes til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: For example, setting this property to `2` binds only the root node and any nodes that are immediately under the root node to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når egenskapen settes `2` binding bare rotnoden og noder som er like under rotnoden til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: All remaining nodes in the data source are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Alle gjenværende noder i datakilden blir ignorert.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > A malicious user can create a callback request and get data for the nodes of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control that the page developer is not displaying.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > En ondsinnet bruker kan opprette en forespørsel om tilbakeringing og Hent data for nodene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll som ikke viser siden developer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, security of the data must be implemented by the data source.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhet på dataene må derfor implementeres av datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Do not use the MaxDataBindDepth property to hide data.
trans-unit.target: Ikke Bruk egenskapen MaxDataBindDepth for å skjule data.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of tree levels to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Det maksimale antallet tre nivåer som skal bindes til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which binds all the tree levels in the data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er -1, som binder alle tre nivåer i datakilden til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The selected value is less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte verdien er mindre enn <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the indentation amount (in pixels) for the child nodes of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor innrykk (i piksler) for underordnet noder av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the NodeIndent property to control the amount of spacing between the left edge of a child node and the left edge of its parent node.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen NodeIndent for å kontrollere avstanden mellom venstre kant av en underordnet node og venstre kant av den overordnede noden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The NodeIndent property affects every child node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I NodeIndent påvirker hver underordnet node i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to control the indentation amount of each node individually.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke mulig å styre innrykk hver node enkeltvis.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between a child node's left edge and its parent node's left edge.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mye mellomrom (i piksler) mellom venstre kant for en underordnet node og den overordnede noden venstre kant.

trans-unit.source: The default is 20.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er 20.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> objects that represents the root nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objekter som representerer rotnoder i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Nodes property to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> object that contains all the root nodes in the tree.
trans-unit.target: Bruk noder-egenskapen for å få en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>objekt som inneholder alle rotnoder i treet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This collection is commonly used to quickly iterate through all the root nodes, or to access a specific root node in the tree.
trans-unit.target: Denne samlingen brukes vanligvis til raskt å gjennom alle rotnoder eller tilgang til en bestemt rotnode i treet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A typical tree structure has only one root node; however, you can add multiple root nodes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En vanlig tre har bare én rotnode; du kan imidlertid legge til flere rotnoder til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The Nodes property can also be used to manage the root nodes in the tree programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen noder kan også brukes til å administrere rotnoder i treet programmatisk.

trans-unit.source: You can add, insert, remove, and retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til, insert, Fjern og hente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter fra samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Any updates to the collection are automatically reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control after the next round trip to the server.
trans-unit.target: Alle oppdateringer i samlingen reflekteres automatisk i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen etter neste rundtur til serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: To access the child nodes of a root node, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property of the node.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til underordnede noder av en rotnode, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>-egenskapen for noden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property of each subsequent parent-level node to navigate down the node levels.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>-egenskapen for hvert etterfølgende overordnede noden du gå nedover node-nivåer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> that contains the root nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> som inneholder rotnoder i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the default appearance of the nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> objekt som lar deg angi standardvisningen av noder i det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the NodeStyle property to control the default appearance of a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk NodeStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere standardvisningen av en node i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `NodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objektet (for eksempel `NodeStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `NodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `NodeStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge, skriftegenskaper og noden avstand.

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1.
trans-unit.target: Stilegenskaper brukes i denne rekkefølgen for prioritet: 1.

trans-unit.source: NodeStyle.
trans-unit.target: NodeStyle.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, avhengig av nodetypen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>samling er angitt, brukes nå, overstyrer de andre noden stilegenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The corresponding node style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> properties override the style settings of the NodeStyle property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > De tilsvarende node stilinnstillingene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>Egenskaper overstyrer stilen for egenskapen NodeStyle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil generere tabellen med innholdet-stil navigasjonsmenyer der noder på et bestemt nivå må ha samme utseendet, uavhengig om de har underordnede noder, kan du vurdere å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>egenskapen i stedet for å angi egenskapene individuelle-stil.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> that represents the default style of a node.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> som representerer standardstilen på en node.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether text wraps in a node when the node runs out of space.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om teksten brytes i en node når noden kjører ikke diskplass.

trans-unit.source: Use the NodeWrap property to specify whether the text that is displayed in each node wraps when it runs out of space.
trans-unit.target: Bruk NodeWrap-egenskapen til å angi om tekst som vises i hver node brytes når den kjører ikke diskplass.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to wrap the text; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>bryte tekst. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et egendefinert bilde for indikatoren ikke kan utvides noden.

trans-unit.source: Use the NoExpandImageUrl property to specify a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: Bruk NoExpandImageUrl-egenskapen til å angi en egendefinert bildet for indikatoren ikke kan utvides noden.

trans-unit.source: The non-expandable node indicator image (or spacer) is displayed next to leaf nodes (in place of the expandable and collapsible node indicators) to align the leaf nodes with parent or root nodes.
trans-unit.target: Ikke kan utvides noden indikatorbilde (eller avstand) vises ved siden av bladnoder (i stedet utvides og skjules node-indikatorer) Hvis du vil justere blad-nodene med overordnet eller rot noder.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>er satt til `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>viser kontrollen plusstegnet (+) eller minustegn (-) eller et plassholderbilde ved siden av en node som viser om noden utvides, skjules eller ikke kan utvides, henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify custom images by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A> property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the NoExpandImageUrl, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> properties to the URLs of the custom images.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egendefinerte bilder av første den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>egenskapen `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, og deretter angi NoExpandImageUrl, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>egenskapene til URL-adresser for de egendefinerte bildene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no images are specified, the default images are used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen bilder er angitt, brukes standard bilder.

trans-unit.source: To hide the expansion node indicators, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil skjule utvidelse noden indikatorer, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To ensure that nodes align correctly in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the NoExpandImageUrl, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> properties have the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Å sikre at noder Juster på riktig måte i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollere ved bruk av egendefinerte bilder, må du kontrollere at alle bilder som er angitt av NoExpandImageUrl <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>egenskapene har samme dimensjoner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The URL to a custom image to display for non-expandable nodes.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til et egendefinert bilde skal vises for ikke kan utvides noder.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which displays the default blank image.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), som viser standard tomme bildet.

trans-unit.source: You can optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property of a node to specify which event is raised when that node is selected.
