trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate"> </xref> hendelse av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: Det er noen ganger praktisk å forhåndsdefinere statisk trestrukturen på grunn av datastørrelsen eller innhold som er avhenger av brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: Derfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen støtter dynamiske noden populasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>for en node er satt til `true`, noden henter utfylt ved kjøretid når noden utvides.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: To populate a node dynamically, first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for the node to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å fylle ut en node dynamisk først angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>egenskapen for noden som `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, define an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event that programmatically populates the node.
trans-unit.target: Deretter definerer en hendelseshåndtering metoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>hendelsen som fyller ut noden programmatisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>

trans-unit.source: A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of the node being populated.
trans-unit.target: Vanlige hendelseshåndtering metoden henter noden data fra en datakilde, plasserer dataene i en node-struktur og legger til noden strukturen til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>samling av noden som utfylt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: A node structure is created by adding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of a parent node.
trans-unit.target: En node-struktur som er opprettet ved å legge til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>samling av en overordnet node.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>for en node er satt til `true`, noden må fylles ut dynamisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke deklarativt neste en annen node under den. ellers oppstår en feil på siden.

trans-unit.source: Supported browsers (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0-compatible browsers and later) can also take advantage of client-side node population.
trans-unit.target: Støttede nettlesere (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0-kompatibel nettlesere og nyere) kan også dra nytte av klientsiden noden populasjon.

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this allows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to populate a node on the client dynamically when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Når aktivert dette tillater at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen til å fylle en node på klienten dynamisk når den noden utvides, noe som hindrer at du må legge inn på serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: For more information on client-side node population, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon på klientsiden noden populasjonen, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The OnTreeNodePopulate method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnTreeNodePopulate kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of parent nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til overordnede noder i det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the ParentNodeStyle property to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ParentNodeStyle-egenskapen for å styre hvordan de overordnede nodene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objektet (for eksempel `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge, skriftegenskaper og noden avstand.

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1.
trans-unit.target: Stilegenskaper brukes i denne rekkefølgen for prioritet: 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, ParentNodeStyle, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, ParentNodeStyle, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, avhengig av nodetypen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>samling er angitt, brukes nå, overstyrer de andre noden stilegenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil generere tabellen med innholdet-stil navigasjonsmenyer der noder på et bestemt nivå må ha samme utseendet, uavhengig om de har underordnede noder, kan du vurdere å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>egenskapen i stedet for å angi egenskapene individuelle-stil.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the parent nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen på de overordnede nodene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character that is used to delimit the node values that are specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tegnet som brukes til å avgrense noden verdiene som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property contains a delimiter-separated list of node values that form a path from the root node to the current node.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>egenskapen inneholder en skilletegn kommadelte verdiliste noden som utgjør en bane fra rotnoden til den gjeldende noden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the PathSeparator property to specify the delimiter character that is used to separate the node values.
trans-unit.target: Bruk PathSeparator-egenskapen til å angi skilletegnet som brukes til å skille node-verdier.

trans-unit.source: This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien brukes vanligvis under analysering av listen for individuelle verdiene.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the text that is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av tekst som vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll, skilletegnet kan må endres for å hindre at noen er i konflikt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed text should not contain any commas; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property cannot be parsed accurately.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du angir skilletegnet til et komma, skal vises teksten ikke inneholde noen komma; Hvis ikke, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>egenskapen kan ikke analyseres nøyaktig.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The character used to delimit the node values specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath*> property.
trans-unit.target: Tegnet som brukes til å avgrense nodeverdiene som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a slash mark (/).
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en skråstrek (/).

trans-unit.source: Creates all the nodes based on the data source.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter alle noder basert på datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The PerformDataBinding method is a helper method that is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to bind the specified data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PerformDataBinding er en hjelper som kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen skal bindes den angitte datakilden til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether node data is populated on demand from the client.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om dataene for noden fylles på forespørsel fra klienten.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: Det er noen ganger praktisk å forhåndsdefinere statisk trestrukturen på grunn av datastørrelsen eller innhold som er avhenger av brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: Derfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen støtter dynamiske noden populasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>for en node er satt til `true`, noden henter utfylt ved kjøretid når noden utvides.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to populating nodes on demand, it is possible to populate the nodes directly on a supported client browser.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til å fylle ut noder ved behov, er det mulig å fylle ut noder direkte på en nettleser som støttes.

trans-unit.source: When the PopulateNodesFromClient property is set to `true`, a service is called from the client to populate the tree nodes, which eliminates the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen PopulateNodesFromClient er satt til `true`, en tjeneste kalles fra klienten til å fylle ut trenoder, som fjerner behovet for å legge inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control posts back to the server to populate the nodes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen legger inn på serveren til å fylle ut nodene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A> property must also be set to `true` in order for the PopulateNodesFromClient property to be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A>egenskapen må også settes til `true` for at egenskapen PopulateNodesFromClient må være angitt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A>

trans-unit.source: To populate a node on the client, first set the PopulateNodesFromClient property to `true` and then set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for the node to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å fylle ut en node på klienten først egenskapen PopulateNodesFromClient til `true` og angi deretter det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>-egenskapen for noden som `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, define an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event that programmatically populates the node.
trans-unit.target: Deretter definerer en hendelseshåndtering metoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>hendelsen som fyller ut noden programmatisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>

trans-unit.source: A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of the node being populated.
trans-unit.target: Vanlige hendelseshåndtering metoden henter noden data fra en datakilde, plasserer dataene i en node-struktur og legger til noden strukturen til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>samling av noden som utfylt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You create a node structure by adding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of a parent node.
trans-unit.target: Du oppretter en node-struktur ved å legge til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objekter til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>samling av en overordnet node.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>for en node er satt til `true`, noden må fylles ut dynamisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke deklarativt neste en annen node under den. ellers oppstår en feil på siden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The client-side node population feature is supported in browsers that support callback scripts.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Klientsiden noden populasjon-funksjonen støttes i nettlesere som støtter tilbakeringing skript.

trans-unit.source: To check whether a browser supports callback scripts access, use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class.
trans-unit.target: For å kontrollere om en nettleser støtter tilbakeringing skript tilgang, bruker du <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>klassen.</xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class for the current request through the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til forekomsten av <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>klassen for den gjeldende forespørselen via <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>klassen.</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to populate tree node data on demand from the client; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å fylle ut tre noden data på forespørsel fra klienten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the callback event using the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer tilbakeringing hendelsen med de angitte argumentene.

trans-unit.source: The RaiseCallbackEvent method is a helper method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaiseCallbackEvent er en helper for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer et valgfritt hendelsen argument skal sendes til hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: Enables the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control to process an event that is raised when a form is posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen for å behandle en hendelse som oppstår når et skjema legges til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method is a helper method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostBackEvent er en helper for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> metoden.

trans-unit.source: The page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the RaisePostBackEvent method of the control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Siden sender verdien for den `eventArgument` parameter for RaisePostBackEvent-metoden for kontrollen som implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control also renders the HTML element that causes the postback event to occur.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen gjengir også HTML-elementet som fører til at sende tilbake hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: If the control renders client-side script to post back to the server, the argument from the script is passed in the `eventArgument` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen gjengir-skript ikke poste på serveren, argumentet fra skriptet er sendt av `eventArgument` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: If the postback event is caused by a simple submit to the server, the `eventArgument` parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis hendelsen sende tilbake skyldes et enkelt sender til serveren av `eventArgument` parameteren er `null`.

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method provides the functionality for many events that are implemented by HTML and Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostBackEvent gir funksjonaliteten for mange hendelser som implementeres av HTML- og Web server-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer et valgfritt hendelsen argument skal sendes til hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: Signals the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control to notify the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Signaler den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen skal varsles ASP.NET-programmet som tilstanden til kontrollen er endret.

trans-unit.source: Change events for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control are raised from the RaisePostDataChangedEvent method.
trans-unit.target: Endre hendelser for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen aktiveres fra metoden RaisePostDataChangedEvent.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Renders the HTML opening tag of the control to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser HTML startkoden kontrollens til den angitte writer.

trans-unit.source: The RenderBeginTag method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderBeginTag brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer den utdata dataflyten som skal gjengi HTML-innhold på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Renders the nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser noder i det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the RenderContents method to render the nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to the client.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RenderContents-metoden til å gjengi noder i det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen til klienten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream used to write content to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer utdata dataflyten brukes til å skrive innholdet til en webside.

trans-unit.source: Renders the HTML closing tag of the control to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser HTML sluttkoden kontrollens til den angitte writer.

trans-unit.source: The RenderEndTag method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderEndTag brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer den utdata dataflyten som skal gjengi HTML-innhold på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the root node in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til rotnoden i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the RootNodeStyle property to control the appearance of the root node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RootNodeStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til rotnoden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `RootNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>objektet (for eksempel `RootNodeStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RootNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `RootNodeStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge, skriftegenskaper og noden avstand.

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1.
trans-unit.target: Stilegenskaper brukes i denne rekkefølgen for prioritet: 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: RootNodeStyle, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: RootNodeStyle, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, avhengig av nodetypen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>samling er angitt, brukes nå, overstyrer de andre noden stilegenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>4.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil generere tabellen med innholdet-stil navigasjonsmenyer der noder på et bestemt nivå må ha samme utseendet, uavhengig om de har underordnede noder, kan du vurdere å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>egenskapen i stedet for å angi egenskapene individuelle-stil.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the root node in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen på rotnode i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The server control's current view state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if there is no view state associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Serveren kontrollens gjeldende visningsstatus; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, hvis det er ingen visningsstatusen som er knyttet til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object that represents the selected node in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objektet som representerer den valgte noden i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The text of a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control can be in one of two modes: selection mode and navigation mode.
trans-unit.target: Teksten i en node i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen kan være i ett av to måter: valgmodus og navigasjonsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: By default, a node is in selection mode.
trans-unit.target: Som standard er en node i valgmodus.

trans-unit.source: To put a node into navigation mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property for the node to a value other than an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: For å sette en node i navigasjonsmodus, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>egenskapen for noden til en annen verdi enn en tom streng ("").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To put a node into selection mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property for the node to empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: For å sette en node i valgmodus, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>-egenskapen for noden til tom streng ("").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a node is in selection mode, the user can select a node by clicking on the text in the node.
trans-unit.target: Når en node er i valgmodus, kan brukeren velger en node ved å klikke på teksten i noden.

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedNode property to determine which node is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SelectedNode-egenskapen for å fastslå hvilke noden er valgt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A node cannot be selected when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En node kan ikke være valgt når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen viser hyperkoblinger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When hyperlinks are displayed, the SelectedNode property always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hyperkoblinger, vises egenskapen SelectedNode returnerer alltid `null`.

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a different node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control by clicking the text in the new node, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event is raised, by default.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren velger en annen node i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen ved å klikke teksten i noden for nye den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår som standard.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can specify a different event by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property for the property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en ny hendelse ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>egenskapen for egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available options.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser tilgjengelige alternativer.

trans-unit.source: |Selection action|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: | Utvalget handlingen | Beskrivelse | |----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>| Aktiverer/deaktiverer noden mellom utvides skjules.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> event, as appropriate.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|Raises no events when a node is selected.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event when a node is selected.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|Raises both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>etter behov. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>| Opphøyer ingen hendelser når en node er valgt. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>| Opphøyer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>-hendelse når en node er valgt. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>| Opphøyer både den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>hendelser når en node er valgt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>

trans-unit.source: Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: Noder bare utvides, skjules aldri. | > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>gjengis ikke for en node med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>-egenskapen satt til `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the selected node in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> som representerer den valgte noden i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a node is selected in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en node er valgt i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedNodeChanged event is raised when a node is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: SelectedNodeChanged denne hendelsen oppstår når en node er valgt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating the displayed content, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel oppdatere viste innhold når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: You can optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property for a node to specify which event is raised when that node is selected.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>egenskapen for en node til å angi hvilken denne hendelsen oppstår når denne noden er valgt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available options.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser tilgjengelige alternativer.

trans-unit.source: |Selection action|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: | Utvalget handlingen | Beskrivelse | |----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>| Aktiverer/deaktiverer noden mellom utvides skjules.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> event, as appropriate.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|Raises no events when a node is selected.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|Raises the SelectedNodeChanged event when a node is selected.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|Raises both the SelectedNodeChanged and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>etter behov. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>| Opphøyer ingen hendelser når en node er valgt. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>| Opphøyer SelectedNodeChanged-hendelse når en node er valgt. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>| Opphøyer både SelectedNodeChanged og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>hendelser når en node er valgt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>

trans-unit.source: Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: Noder bare utvides, skjules aldri. | > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>gjengis ikke for en node med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>-egenskapen satt til `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedNodeChanged event is fired only on post back when a user clicks a node.
trans-unit.target: SelectedNodeChanged hendelsen aktiveres på post tilbake når brukeren klikker en node.

trans-unit.source: The event is not fired if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property is changed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen aktiveres ikke hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>egenskapen endres programmatisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the selected node in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for den valgte noden i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the SelectedNodeStyle property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at SelectedNodeStyle-egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the selected node.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for den valgte noden.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedValue property provides a convenient way to determine the value of the selected node.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedValue er det enkelt å bestemme verdien for den valgte noden.

trans-unit.source: This property simply returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that is referred to by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen bare verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objektet som det refereres til av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no node is currently selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, an empty string ("") is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen node for øyeblikket er valgt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollere, en tom streng (""), returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The value of the selected node.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den valgte noden.

trans-unit.source: Allows a derived class to set whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> control is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Tillater en utledede klassen for å angi om den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til data.

trans-unit.source: Use the SetNodeDataBound method to indicate whether the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden SetNodeDataBound som viser om den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>er bundet til data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> to set.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> to set.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to set the node as data-bound; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Slik angir du node som databundet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Allows a derived class to set the data item for the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Tillater en utledede klassen angi dataelementet for det angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the SetNodeDataItem method to specify the data item for the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SetNodeDataItem-metoden til å angi dataelementet for det angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> to set.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> to set.

trans-unit.source: The data item for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dataelement den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Allows a derived class to set the data path for the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Tillater en utledede klassen angi databanen for det angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the SetNodeDataPath method to set the data path for the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SetNodeDataPath-metoden til å angi databanen for det angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> to set.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> to set.

trans-unit.source: The data path for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Databanen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating which node types will display a check box in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvilke typer vises en avmerkingsboks i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To provide multi-node selection support in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, you can display check boxes next to the image for a node.
trans-unit.target: Angi flere noder utvalget støtte i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen, kan du vise avmerkingsboksene ved siden av bildet for en node.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowCheckBoxes property to specify which node types will display a check box.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ShowCheckBoxes-egenskapen til å angi hvilke typer vises merket i avmerkingsboksen.

trans-unit.source: For example, if this property is set to `TreeNodeType.Parent`, check boxes are displayed for each parent node in the tree.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er satt til for eksempel `TreeNodeType.Parent`, vises av i avmerkingsboksene for hver overordnet node i treet.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid values for this property.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser gyldige verdier for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: |Node type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeType.All`|Check boxes are displayed for all nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.Leaf`|Check boxes are displayed for all leaf nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.None`|Check boxes are not displayed.| |`TreeNodeType.Parent`|Check boxes are displayed for all parent nodes.| |`TreeNodeType.Root`|Check boxes are displayed for all root nodes.| The enumeration type that is used for the ShowCheckBoxes property is a flag enumeration, which allows you to combine values through bitwise operations.
trans-unit.target: | Nodetypen | Beskrivelse | |---------------|-----------------| | `TreeNodeType.All`| Avmerkingsboksene vises for alle noder. | | `TreeNodeType.Leaf`| Avmerkingsboksene vises for alle bladnoder. | | `TreeNodeType.None`| Avmerkingsboksene blir ikke vist. | | `TreeNodeType.Parent`| Avmerkingsboksene vises for alle overordnede noder. | | `TreeNodeType.Root`| Avmerkingsboksene vises for alle rotmappen noder. | Opplistingstypen som brukes for egenskapen ShowCheckBoxes er flaggopplisting, slik at du kan kombinere verdier via bitvis operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: For example, to display check boxes for the parent and leaf nodes, use the bitwise OR operator to combine the `TreeNodeType.Parent` and `TreeNodeType.Leaf` values.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel bruke bitvis OR-operatoren for å vise av i avmerkingsboksene for overordnede og blad-noder, til å kombinere den `TreeNodeType.Parent` og `TreeNodeType.Leaf` verdier.

trans-unit.source: To determine which nodes have their check box selected, iterate through the nodes of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Å finne ut hvilke noder har sine avmerkingsboks merket, gå gjennom nodene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can override the ShowCheckBoxes setting by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property for each node.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan overstyre ShowCheckBoxes innstillingen av innstillingen av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>-egenskapen for hver node.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to provide only single-selection support, consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du må angi bare én utvalg støtte, kan du vurdere å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_TreeNodeType.None" name="TreeNodeType.None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_TreeNodeType.None" name="TreeNodeType.None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The bitwise combination value is outside the range of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Bitvis kombinasjon-verdien er utenfor området for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether expansion node indicators are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om utvidelse noden indikatorer vises.

trans-unit.source: Expansion node indicators are used to show whether a node is expanded, collapsed, or non-expandable.
trans-unit.target: Utvidelse noden indikatorer brukes til å vise om en node utvidede skjult eller ikke kan utvides.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowExpandCollapse property to specify whether the expansion node indicators are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ShowExpandCollapse-egenskapen til å angi om utvidelse noden indikatorer vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When the ShowExpandCollapse property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen ShowExpandCollapse er satt til `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>viser kontrollen plusstegnet (+) eller minustegn (-) eller et plassholderbilde ved siden av en node som viser om noden utvides, skjules eller ikke kan utvides, henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can specify custom images by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A> property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> properties to the URLs of the custom images.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egendefinerte bilder av første den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>egenskapen `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, og deretter angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>egenskapene til URL-adresser for de egendefinerte bildene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no images are specified, the default images are used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen bilder er angitt, brukes standard bilder.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show the expansion node indicators; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Vis utvidelsen noden indikatorer; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether lines connecting child nodes to parent nodes are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om linjer tilkobling underordnede noder på overordnede noder vises.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowLines property to specify whether the lines that are connecting child nodes to parent nodes are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ShowLines-egenskapen til å angi om linjene som kobler underordnede noder på overordnede noder som skal vises.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control searches the Web-accessible folder that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A> property for the line images.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen søker tilgjengelig mappen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>egenskapen for linjebilder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control will use the built-in, default images (20 x 20 pixels).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen bruker de innebygde standardbildene (20 x 20 piksler).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display lines connecting nodes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å vise linjer mellom nodene; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that is used to render alternate text for screen readers to skip the content for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som brukes til å gjengi alternativ tekst for skjermlesere å hoppe over innholdet for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SkipLinkText property is a property that you can set to make a Web page more or less accessible.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SkipLinkText er en egenskap som du kan angi foreta en webside mer eller mindre tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Web pages that contain content that repeats can provide for a mechanism for users of screen readers to skip the content from being read aloud.
trans-unit.target: Nettsider som inneholder innhold som gjentas kan angi en mekanisme for brukere av skjermlesere å hoppe over innholdet ikke kan leses høyt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control provides the SkipLinkText property as a way for the entire control to be skipped by screen readers.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen gir egenskapen SkipLinkText som en metode for hele kontrollen skal hoppes over skjermen lesere.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: If the SkipLinkText property is set, an invisible image with alternate text is rendered, giving the user the option to jump to the end of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis SkipLinkText-egenskapen er angitt, gjengis et usynlig bilde med alternativ tekst gir brukeren mulighet til å hoppe til slutten av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Screen readers read the alternate text aloud, while the image occupies only one pixel space.
trans-unit.target: Skjermlesere leses høyt, alternativ tekst mens bildet tar bare én pikselbredden plass.

trans-unit.source: For pixel-precise control over the rendering of the page, set the SkipLinkText property to an empty string ("") and provide your own mechanism to skip the tree.
trans-unit.target: For pikselbredden nøyaktig kontroll over gjengivelse av siden, kan du angi egenskapen SkipLinkText til en tom streng ("") og angi din egen mekanisme for å hoppe over treet.

trans-unit.source: The SkipLinkText property is set to the empty string by default, which makes screen readers not skip the control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SkipLinkText er satt til en tom streng som standard gjør skjermlesere ikke hoppes over kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> renders as alternate text with an invisible image as a hint to screen readers.
trans-unit.target: En streng som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> blir gjengitt som alternativ tekst med et usynlig bilde som en referanse til skjermlesere.

trans-unit.source: The default is "Skip Navigation Links."
trans-unit.target: Standard er "Skip koblinger."

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer resultatet av en tilbakeringing hendelse som er rettet mot en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to retrieve data and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.GetCallbackResult%2A> method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollere implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>grensesnittet og bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>til å hente data og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.GetCallbackResult%2A>metode for å returnere de hentede dataene til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.GetCallbackResult%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: Resultatene av tilbakeringing.

trans-unit.source: Raises the callback event using the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer tilbakeringing hendelsen med de angitte argumentene.

trans-unit.source: Control developers should override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere må overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaiseCallbackEvent%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaiseCallbackEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer et valgfritt hendelsen argument skal sendes til hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: Processes postback data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Prosesser tilbake dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Control developers should override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LoadPostData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere må overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LoadPostData%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LoadPostData%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen identifikatoren for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen av alle navneverdier som innkommende.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control's state changes as a result of the postback event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollens tilstandsendringer som et resultat av hendelsen sende tilbake; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Signals the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control to notify the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Signaler den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen skal varsles ASP.NET-programmet som tilstanden til kontrollen er endret.

trans-unit.source: Control developers should override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere må overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Enables the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control to process an event that is raised when a form is posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen for å behandle en hendelse som oppstår når et skjema legges til serveren.

trans-unit.source: Control developers should override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere må overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer et valgfritt hendelsen argument skal sendes til hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> value for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref> verdi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The TagKey property allows the output stream to write the appropriate HTML mark-up for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen TagKey tillater utdata dataflyten å skrive den riktige HTML merke pålogging for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Always returns a <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid en <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content that is associated with a node.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir målvinduet eller rammen der du vil vise nettsiden innholdet som er knyttet til en node.

trans-unit.source: Use the Target property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Target-egenskapen til å angi vinduet eller rammen der du vil vise webinnhold som er knyttet til en node når noden klikkes.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Target property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Target-egenskapen blir gjengitt som et `target` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: Den `target` attributtet for `anchor` elementer er ikke tillatt i typedefinisjonen XHTML 1.1 dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Do not set the Target property, if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> must be XHTML 1.1 compliant.
trans-unit.target: Ikke angi egenskapen Target hvis den gjengitte utdata for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>må være XHTML 1.1 kompatible.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [XHTML standarder i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > > When creating accessible Web pages, you should avoid using the Target property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: >> Når du oppretter tilgjengelig nettsider, bør du ikke bruke Target-egenskapen til et nytt vindu som mål.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.
trans-unit.target: Målvinduet eller rammen der du vil vise innholdet koblede websiden.

trans-unit.source: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Verdier må begynne med en bokstav i området for A til Z (bokstaver), bortsett fra bestemte spesielle verdier som begynner med et understrekingstegn som vises i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: Target value
trans-unit.target: Målverdien

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in
trans-unit.target: Gjengir innholdet i

trans-unit.source: A new window without frames.
trans-unit.target: Et nytt vindu uten forhandleren.

trans-unit.source: The immediate frameset parent.
trans-unit.target: Overordnet umiddelbar rammesett.

trans-unit.source: The search pane.
trans-unit.target: Søk-ruten.

trans-unit.source: The frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: Rammens med fokus.

trans-unit.source: The full window without frames.
trans-unit.target: Hele vinduet uten forhandleren.

trans-unit.source: Check your browser documentation to determine if the <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""></xref> value is supported.
trans-unit.target: Se i dokumentasjonen for nettleseren for å finne ut om den <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""> </xref> verdien støttes.

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later supports the <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""></xref> target value.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 og senere støtter den <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""> </xref> målverdi.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), som oppdaterer vinduet eller ramme med fokus.

trans-unit.source: Tracks view-state changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control so that they can be stored in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object for the control.
trans-unit.target: Sporer visningsstatus endringer i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollere slik at de kan lagres i det <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref> objekt for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref> er tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The TrackViewState method is overridden to mark the starting point to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the view state for the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden TrackViewState overstyres for å merke utgangspunkt for å begynne å spore og lagre endringene til kontrollen som en del av visningsstatusen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a check box in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control changes state between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en avmerkingsboks i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen endrer status mellom legges til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeCheckChanged event is raised when a check box in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control changes state between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeCheckChanged denne hendelsen oppstår når en avmerkingsboks i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>kontrollen endrer status mellom legges til serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a database or the displayed content, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel oppdatere en database eller viste innhold når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: Even though the TreeNodeCheckChanged event is fired on post back, changing a check box does not cause a post back.
trans-unit.target: Selv om TreeNodeCheckChanged hendelsen aktiveres på post tilbake, hvis du endrer en avmerkingsboks fører ikke til en post tilbake.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
